sentences.en: "Is she coming by coach?"— 'Well I've no idea.'
sentences.cn: “她坐长途汽车来吗？”——“哦，我不知道。”

sentences.en: a coach trip to Scotland
sentences.cn: 去苏格兰的长途公共汽车之行

sentences.en: a tennis coach
sentences.cn: 网球教练

sentences.en: A tyre blew out when the coach was on its way.
sentences.cn: 长途汽车在半路上爆胎了。

sentences.en: Any coach worth his salt would do exactly as I did.
sentences.cn: 任何称职的教练都会采取和我一模一样的行动。

sentences.en: Discipline was the new coach's secret weapon.
sentences.cn: 严格的训练是新任教练的秘密武器。

sentences.en: He gently coached me in French.
sentences.cn: 他为我补习法语，态度十分温和。

sentences.en: he's driving a coach and horses through our environmental legislation.
sentences.cn: 他要使我们的环境立法无效。

sentences.en: I hate travelling by coach.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢坐长途汽车。

sentences.en: It is understood he had a blow-up with coach Chris Anderson.
sentences.cn: 据了解，他和教练克里斯·安德森之间爆发了激烈争吵。

sentences.en: New York needed little prompting from their coach Bill Parcells.
sentences.cn: 纽约队不太需要他们的教练比尔·帕索斯的鼓动。

sentences.en: Nigel coaches a cricket team in his spare time.
sentences.cn: 奈杰尔业余时间担任一个板球队的教练。

sentences.en: Paula had put out her luggage for the coach.
sentences.cn: 葆拉拿好行李准备上长途汽车。

sentences.en: She coaches students in French, usually for exams.
sentences.cn: 她辅导学生法语，通常是准备考试的学生。

sentences.en: The British coach is putting the boxers through their paces.
sentences.cn: 英国教练正在检验拳手们的能力。

sentences.en: The coach rocked dangerously.
sentences.cn: 那辆长途汽车危险地颠簸摇晃。

sentences.en: The coach tried to get his charges motivated.
sentences.cn: 教练试图激发队员的积极性。

sentences.en: The coach was a masterpiece of Teutonic engineering.
sentences.cn: 这种长途汽车是体现德国工程设计水平的杰作。

sentences.en: The Lord Mayor follows at the rear in his gilded coach.
sentences.cn: 市长大人坐在他阔气的马车里在后面跟着。

sentences.en: the Norwegian national coach
sentences.cn: 挪威国家队教练

sentences.en: The restaurant was full of coach parties (= groups of people travelling together on a coach ) .
sentences.cn: 这家饭店里用餐的全是乘长途公共汽车的旅游团。

sentences.en: Tony Woodcock has joined German amateur team SC Brueck as coach.
sentences.cn: 托尼·伍德科克加盟德国业余队SC布吕克队担任教练。

sentences.en: What you need is a drama coach.
sentences.cn: 你需要的是一位戏剧辅导老师。

phrases.phrase: drive a coach and horses through

trans.tran_cn: 教练，辅导教师，长途汽车，（火车）旅客车厢，四轮大马车，经济舱
trans.tran_en: someone who trains a person or team in a sport
someone who trains a person or team in a sport

trans.tran_cn: 当教练，训练，指导，辅导，给…补习
trans.tran_en: to teach a person or team the skills they need for a sport
someone who trains a person or team in a sport

trans.tran_cn: 训练， 指导， 辅导
trans.tran_en: to teach a person or team the skills they need for a sport
